relation.text: six weeks ago , she was but just recoverd from a very dangerous illneſs by the great skill of Dr. Parry who as well as myself had very serious apprehensions for her ; her disorder was brought on
remain My dear Sir Your faithful humble Servt . Frederick Hamilton N o . 1 Brock St . Bath November 12
1807 . John Dickenson Esqr Leighton Buzzard single Bedfordſhire a prebendary of Lincoln to whom this House we occupy
